title: Virus & Malware Removal in The Villages, FL
headline: Clean infections, restore trust, and lock down your devices professionally.
description: Local virus and malware removal in The Villages. We remove threats, restore your system, and secure it against future attacks. Fast, professional, and discreet service.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
sections.paragraph: Some malware can silently collect your passwords, track browsing, or turn your computer into part of a criminal botnet. All without triggering antivirus alerts.

sections.heading: What We Do
items: Detect and remove viruses, spyware, rootkits, and persistent threats
Diagnose slowdowns, pop-ups, and strange system behavior
Audit installed programs and browser extensions for hidden malware
Restore system performance without wiping your data
Harden your system and install real protections

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.paragraph: We begin with a forensic-style malware scan, isolate infected files, and restore your system. Then we implement real-world protections like DNS filtering, application control, and privacy-respecting antivirus solutions. Without selling you more software.
